page.title: 17TWO PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: Situated on the main road to Malmes_ bury and in the hamlet of Pinkney,is the{Eagle Inn.}The Pub though simply furnished has a friendly atmosphere & serves beer & Cider.Bill & Ann Pritch_ ard recently celebrated 25 years as mine hosts.Bill,a large jovial gentle_ man is very much a local character known to farmers,hunt_followers & villagers.Regular drinkers await the coming of the promised skittle alley. {The Carpenters Arms}stands in Easton Town on the corner of Easton Square.It has been modernised recently. Mrs.Pat Grubb who took over the management from her father decided this year to retire from the licensing trade.The new licensee is Mr.Kenneth Chesworth.The Pub has a pleasant at_ mosphere & an active darts team.Simple but homely food is now usually served.
